title: Graph IQ scores how many 2 standard dev above mean

content.question: A psychologist administered the most recent edition of the Stanford-Binet IQ test to 50 students and their scores are shown in the chart above. How many students earned scores higher than two standard deviations above the mean?

skill.text: 3.B: Calculate and interpret measures of central tendency, variation, and percentile rank in a given data set.
